full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSANGS MCHOG BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO DANG, RLUNG RTA'I BSANGS CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,BSANGS MCHOG BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA GTOR 'BUL SDUS PA BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI TSIGS LA 'DON PA'I CHED DANG RNAM DPYOD DANG SPOBS PA PHUL DU BYUNG BA AER TE NI GU SHR'I KUN DGA' DON GRUB CES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU BSDUS PA ZHIG GOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA YID CHIS PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA NI PRADZNY'AS PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUNG RING DU GNAS PA DANG, @010B 'GRO BA THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS SU BAR CHAD SEL ZHING, ,MNAR THUR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: SU MA TI MA NI PRADZNY'A,
